verses.verse: And they continued <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> without war <S%H4421><s%> between Syria <S%H758><s%> and Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And it came to pass in the third <S%H7992><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, that Y'hoshafat <S%H3092><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto his servants <S%H5650><s%>, Know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> ye that Ramoth <S%H7433><s%> in Gil`ad <S%H1568><s%> is ours, and we be still <S%H2814><s%> <S%H8688><s%>, and take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it not out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Syria <S%H758><s%> ?

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Y'hoshafat <S%H3092><s%>, Wilt thou go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with me to battle <S%H4421><s%> to Ramothgilead <S%H7433><s%> <S%H1568><s%>? And Y'hoshafat <S%H3092><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, I am as thou <S%H3644><s%> art, my people <S%H5971><s%> as thy people <S%H5971><s%>, my horses <S%H5483><s%> as thy horses <S%H5483><s%>.

And Y'hoshafat <S%H3092><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, Enquire <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, I pray thee, at the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> to day <S%H3117><s%>.

Then the king <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> gathered <S%H6908><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%> together <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, about four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> men <S%H376><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Shall I go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against Ramothgilead <S%H7433><s%> <S%H1568><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%>, or shall I forbear <S%H2308><s%> <S%H8799><s%>? And they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8798><s%>; for the YY <S%H136><s%> shall deliver <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%>.

And Y'hoshafat <S%H3092><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Is there not here a prophet <S%H5030><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> besides <S%H5750><s%>, that we might enquire <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of him?

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Y'hoshafat <S%H3092><s%>, There is yet one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%>, Mikhay'hu <S%H4321><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Imlah <S%H3229><s%>, by whom we may enquire <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>: but I hate <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him; for he doth not prophesy <S%H5012><s%> <S%H8691><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> concerning me, but evil <S%H7451><s%>. And Y'hoshafat <S%H3092><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Let not the king <S%H4428><s%> say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> so.

Then the king <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> an <S%H259><s%> officer <S%H5631><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Hasten <S%H4116><s%> <S%H8761><s%> hither Mikhay'hu <S%H4321><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Imlah <S%H3229><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> and Y'hoshafat <S%H3092><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> sat <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> each <S%H376><s%> on his throne <S%H3678><s%>, having put on <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8794><s%> their robes <S%H899><s%>, in a void place <S%H1637><s%> in the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of SHomron <S%H8111><s%>; and all the prophets <S%H5030><s%> prophesied <S%H5012><s%> <S%H8693><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them.

And TZidkiyah-yahu <S%H6667><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Chenaanah <S%H3668><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him shofars <S%H7161><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%>: and he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, With these shalt thou push <S%H5055><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the Syrians <S%H758><s%>, until thou have consumed <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8763><s%> them.

And all the prophets <S%H5030><s%> prophesied <S%H5012><s%> <S%H8737><s%> so, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8798><s%> to Ramothgilead <S%H7433><s%> <S%H1568><s%>, and prosper <S%H6743><s%> <S%H8685><s%>: for the YY <S%H3068><s%> shall deliver <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it into the king's <S%H4428><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And the messenger <S%H4397><s%> that was gone <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8800><s%> Mikhay'hu <S%H4321><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto him, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Behold now, the words <S%H1697><s%> of the prophets <S%H5030><s%> declare good <S%H2896><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%> with one <S%H259><s%> mouth <S%H6310><s%>: let thy word <S%H1697><s%>, I pray thee, be like the word <S%H1697><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> of them, and speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> that which is good <S%H2896><s%>.

And Mikhay'hu <S%H4321><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, As the YY <S%H3068><s%> liveth <S%H2416><s%>, what the YY <S%H3068><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, that will I speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%>.

So he came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%>. And the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Mikhay'hu <S%H4321><s%>, shall we go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against Ramothgilead <S%H7433><s%> <S%H1568><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%>, or shall we forbear <S%H2308><s%> <S%H8799><s%>? And he answered <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him, Go <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and prosper <S%H6743><s%> <S%H8685><s%>: for the YY <S%H3068><s%> shall deliver <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, How many times <S%H6471><s%> shall I adjure <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8688><s%> thee that thou tell <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> me nothing but that which is true <S%H571><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> ?

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> scattered <S%H6327><s%> <S%H8737><s%> upon the hills <S%H2022><s%>, as sheep <S%H6629><s%> that have not a shepherd <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%>: and the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, These have no master <S%H113><s%>: let them return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> to his house <S%H1004><s%> in peace <S%H7965><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Y'hoshafat <S%H3092><s%>, Did I not tell <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee that he would prophesy <S%H5012><s%> <S%H8691><s%> no good <S%H2896><s%> concerning me, but evil <S%H7451><s%> ?

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thou therefore the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>: I saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> sitting <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> on his throne <S%H3678><s%>, and all the host <S%H6635><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%> by him on his right hand <S%H3225><s%> and on his left <S%H8040><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Who shall persuade <S%H6601><s%> <S%H8762><s%> Ach'av <S%H256><s%>, that he may go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and fall <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> at Ramothgilead <S%H7433><s%> <S%H1568><s%>? And one said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on this manner <S%H3541><s%>, and another said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8802><s%> on that manner <S%H3541><s%>.

And there came forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a spirit <S%H7307><s%>, and stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I will persuade <S%H6601><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Wherewith? And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I will go forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and I will be a lying <S%H8267><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> in the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of all his prophets <S%H5030><s%>. And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Thou shalt persuade <S%H6601><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him, and prevail <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> also: go forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8798><s%> so.

Now therefore, behold, the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a lying <S%H8267><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> in the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of all these thy prophets <S%H5030><s%>, and the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> concerning thee.

But TZidkiyah-yahu <S%H6667><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Chenaanah <S%H3668><s%> went near <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Mikhay'hu <S%H4321><s%> on the cheek <S%H3895><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Which way <S%H335><s%> went <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> from me to speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> unto thee?

And Mikhay'hu <S%H4321><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Behold, thou shalt see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%>, when thou shalt go <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into an inner <S%H2315><s%> chamber <S%H2315><s%> to hide <S%H2247><s%> <S%H8736><s%> thyself.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> Mikhay'hu <S%H4321><s%>, and carry him back <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8685><s%> unto Amon <S%H526><s%> the governor <S%H8269><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, and to Yo'ash <S%H3101><s%> the king's <S%H4428><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>;

And say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>, Put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8798><s%> this fellow in the prison <S%H1004><s%> <S%H3608><s%>, and feed <S%H398><s%> <S%H8685><s%> him with bread <S%H3899><s%> of affliction <S%H3906><s%> and with water <S%H4325><s%> of affliction <S%H3906><s%>, until I come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in peace <S%H7965><s%>.

And Mikhay'hu <S%H4321><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, If thou return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> at all <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in peace <S%H7965><s%>, the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath not spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> by me. And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, O people <S%H5971><s%>, every one of you.

So the king <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> and Y'hoshafat <S%H3092><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Ramothgilead <S%H7433><s%> <S%H1568><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Y'hoshafat <S%H3092><s%>, I will disguise <S%H2664><s%> <S%H8692><s%> myself, and enter <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> into the battle <S%H4421><s%>; but put thou on <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thy robes <S%H899><s%>. And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> disguised <S%H2664><s%> <S%H8691><s%> himself, and went <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the battle <S%H4421><s%>.

But the king <S%H4428><s%> of Syria <S%H758><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> his thirty <S%H7970><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> captains <S%H8269><s%> that had rule over his chariots <S%H7393><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Fight <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8735><s%> neither with small <S%H6996><s%> nor great <S%H1419><s%>, save only with the king <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And it came to pass, when the captains <S%H8269><s%> of the chariots <S%H7393><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> Y'hoshafat <S%H3092><s%>, that they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Surely it is the king <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>. And they turned aside <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8736><s%> against him: and Y'hoshafat <S%H3092><s%> cried out <S%H2199><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And it came to pass, when the captains <S%H8269><s%> of the chariots <S%H7393><s%> perceived <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> that it was not the king <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, that they turned back <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from pursuing <S%H310><s%> him.

And a certain man <S%H376><s%> drew <S%H4900><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a bow <S%H7198><s%> at a venture <S%H8537><s%>, and smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> between the joints <S%H1694><s%> of the harness <S%H8302><s%>: wherefore he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the driver of his chariot <S%H7395><s%>, Turn <S%H2015><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thine hand <S%H3027><s%>, and carry me out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8685><s%> of the host <S%H4264><s%>; for I am wounded <S%H2470><s%> <S%H8717><s%>.

And the battle <S%H4421><s%> increased <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%>: and the king <S%H4428><s%> was stayed up <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8716><s%> in his chariot <S%H4818><s%> against <S%H5227><s%> the Syrians <S%H758><s%>, and died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> at even <S%H6153><s%>: and the blood <S%H1818><s%> ran out <S%H3332><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the wound <S%H4347><s%> into the midst <S%H2436><s%> of the chariot <S%H7393><s%>.

And there went <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a proclamation <S%H7440><s%> throughout the host <S%H4264><s%> about the going down <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of the sun <S%H8121><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Havahry man <S%H376><s%> to his city <S%H5892><s%>, and every man <S%H376><s%> to his own country <S%H776><s%>.

So the king <S%H4428><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and was brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to SHomron <S%H8111><s%>; and they buried <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> in SHomron <S%H8111><s%>.

And one washed <S%H7857><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the chariot <S%H7393><s%> in the pool <S%H1295><s%> of SHomron <S%H8111><s%>; and the dogs <S%H3611><s%> licked up <S%H3952><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his blood <S%H1818><s%>; and they washed <S%H7364><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his armour <S%H2185><s%>; according unto the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> which he spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%>.

Now the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the acts <S%H1697><s%> of Ach'av <S%H256><s%>, and all that he did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and the ivory <S%H8127><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> which he made <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and all the cities <S%H5892><s%> that he built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, are they not written <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the chronicles <S%H1697><s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> ?
So Ach'av <S%H256><s%> slept <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with his fathers <S%H1><s%>; and Ahaziah <S%H274><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in his stead.

And Y'hoshafat <S%H3092><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Asa <S%H609><s%> began to reign <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> over Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> in the fourth <S%H702><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Ach'av <S%H256><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

Y'hoshafat <S%H3092><s%> was thirty <S%H7970><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when he began to reign <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8800><s%>; and he reigned <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>. And his mother's <S%H517><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> was Azubah <S%H5806><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Shilhi <S%H7977><s%>.
